original_title: The Happiest Homecoming on Earth Disneyland's 50th Anniversary
overview: Explore the magic and excitement of Disneyland Resort during the 50th Anniversary Celebration.  At Disneyland we get to see a princess or two in fantasyland, visit Mickey at his house in Toontown, have some fun in New Orleans Square and set sail on the Pirates of the Caribbean and explore the frightening fun of the Haunted Mansion ending our day with Fantasimic and the all-new Remember Dreams Come True fireworks speculator.  Then it’s off to the newest theme park at Disneyland Resort, Disney’s California Adventure.  We wonder the parks four lands celebrating the golden state. Go Soarin Over California and enjoy the seaside parks of yesterday with thrilling rollercoasters and midway rides.  The evening ends at the Downtown Disney District for a high energy your of fine dining, shows, and shopping.
title: The Happiest Homecoming on Earth Disneyland's 50th Anniversary
